footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon, a tea made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis).
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: This brew contains DMT, a molecule that activates brain areas related to introspection, memory, and emotion, allowing for a deep journey of self-knowledge and healing.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches and guides, helping to release emotional blockages, understand life patterns, and connect with a higher consciousness.
benefitClarityDescription: It helps to clear the mind, offering new perspectives on personal problems and situations.
benefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of deep-rooted emotions and traumas, promoting a sense of peace and emotional liberation.
benefitConnectionDescription: Many people experience a profound connection with themselves, with nature, and with the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Group ceremonies create a shared energy of support and companionship, where each participant's process contributes to the collective healing. It is an experience of community and mutual respect.
privateCeremonyDescription: Private ceremonies offer an intimate and personalized space, ideal for those who wish to delve into their process with greater privacy and direct attention from the guide. It is a one-on-one journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and transformative power of the sacred drink Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced team that will accompany you with respect and professionalism on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find all the information you need to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for a profound and meaningful experience.
contactCommunityText: Join our community to connect with other seekers and stay up to date with our latest news and events. We are here to support you on your journey.
whatsappCommunityTitle: Join our WhatsApp community to stay informed about our events.
notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
errorMinLength: The {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your transformation.

questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: Especially heart, blood pressure, or neurological problems.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication?
questionnaireMedicationDesc: Especially antidepressants, anxiolytics, or medication for chronic conditions.

questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: Such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or psychosis.

questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences

questionnaireIntentionDesc: What do you seek to heal, understand, or explore?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: I am looking to heal old wounds and find clarity in my life purpose...
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed the initial questionnaire. You can now explore more content to prepare for your journey.
pleaseCompleteThisStep: Please complete this step to continue.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: These were your responses to the initial questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted any answers yet.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: A complete guide to prepare you for a safe and profound experience with ancestral medicine.
preparationProcessDescription: Ayahuasca works in stages to cleanse your being. It begins with a physical purge, followed by an emotional release, and culminates in a deep spiritual connection. This path allows you to confront and release what no longer serves you.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The central moment where, guided by icaros (sacred songs), you explore your inner world and receive the teachings of the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: Each journey is unique, with visions, emotions, and revelations that guide you towards self-knowledge and healing.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you understand and apply the lessons learned in your daily life, turning the experience into lasting change.
dietSubtitle: To prepare your body and spirit, we recommend a clean diet. This helps the medicine work more effectively and reduces the possibility of uncomfortable physical experiences.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (quinoa, brown rice)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• White meats (chicken, fish)
• Water and natural infusions
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red meat and pork
• Fermented foods (aged cheese, soy)
• Sugars and processed foods
• Alcohol and caffeine
• Spicy or very greasy foods
mentalPrepSubtitle: The days leading up to the ceremony are an opportunity to calm the mind and connect with your intention.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm your mind and open your heart to the experience.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. A clear intention acts as a guide during the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and emotions. This helps clarify your internal state before the journey.
emotionalHealingTitle: A Space for Your Emotional Healing
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony is a safe space to explore and release deep emotions. It is common to experience everything from joy and love to sadness and fear. Allow yourself to feel without judgment, as each emotion is a step towards liberation.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable, warm clothing (in layers)
• Blanket and pillow (optional)
• Personal water bottle
• Personal object or amulet (optional)
essentialsList:
• Open heart and mind
• Respect for the process and guides
• Willingness to surrender to the experience
chatbotWelcome: Welcome! I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team dedicated to accompanying you with love, respect, and deep wisdom.
